website_summaries.verdict: The Withings Thermo is an accurate smart thermometer that measures temperature and logs it an app after a quick swipe across your forehead, but it's very expensive.

customer_reviews.title: Check return policy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use However it gives inaccurate readings and I’ve been told that even though the product is faulty I cannot return it.
customer_reviews.author: Doris6168

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way to measure and record temperatures of young children and babies
customer_reviews.text: Add a family we struggled with thermometers that were easy enough to use with small children and babies. We had under am ones, in ear and the forehead ones. This device makes getting a reading quick, simple and accurate...even with babies when they are asleep. It can assign reasons to different family members and task changes. Automatically uploads the to the app and can be shared on to other apps like apple health. The app also let's you note down if you have your child calpol or any symptoms they showed. An expensive device to be sure, but money well spent I think.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. I already have withings scale so have a withing account etc. It records temperature incredibly quickly easy to link the reading to a family member. Readings are shown in the withings app along with weight etc, but they also come up as notifications on an iPad and iPhone and show on the device too. Compares well to a standard omron thermometer but in a fraction of the time. I will use both as my immune system is compromised at the moment and need to know if my temp goes above 37.5 but the withings will give me the quickest indication of that.
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: The Withings Thermo is easy to use and it seems accurate as I have checked it with a normal thermometer that I have been using for a while and reading the same
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use with a price
customer_reviews.text: For sure, its an expensive device. Bought it because ease of use to record your reading on app. If you don't setup for wifi & using only bluetooth, it will drain your battery out.
customer_reviews.author: Pajill

customer_reviews.title: Great to use
customer_reviews.text: So far only owned and used it for a couple of weeks, I am overwhelmed with it. Great to use, so easy even my kids can do it themselves within seconds. The app is good to keep the history of readings especially to show your GP/doctor when you finally see them. One extremely happy mom on this purchase, expensive I must admit but I think all worth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Took a little while to pair correctly, but once done it works like a charm. The single fact that I don't have to strip the baby to get accurate temperature readings makes it well worth, plus it looks super "gadgety", very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Rui

customer_reviews.title: It's not worth the hype they picture it to be
customer_reviews.text: Its ok for a quick temp read. its not worth the hype the adverts picture it to be. I still question the accuracy of this product, hence I also keep a traditional temp read handy.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design and quality ! It measures temperature very fast , in under 10 seconds (It's like a SciFi gadget :))
customer_reviews.author: Matei Flamaropol

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and so so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Must buy product! Accurate and so so easy to use. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SImply amazing love the way it logs different people and you ...
customer_reviews.text: did allot of reading up on this, decided to buy one. SImply amazing love the way it logs different people and you can assign to profiles. highly recommened.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Thomas Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Very cool. Works on adults and kids a like
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. Works on adults and kids a like. No squirming from the kids as you don't even need to touch them with it (unlike in-ear thermometers). Transmits temperature data to the app. All very slick.
customer_reviews.author: Ed73491

customer_reviews.title: Really good fantastic if you have kids you can check temperature ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good fantastic if you have kids you can check temperature at night when the little ones a sleeping :) fully recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Withings Thermo - Smart Temporal Thermometer, FSA-Eligible, Suitable for Baby, Infant, Toddler and Adults, No Contact Required
product_meta.description:
Style Name:New versionThermo is a game changer. Now, a fast, simple, no-contact gesture yields medical-grade results right on the device and provides an automatic sync with the free Thermo app, available for iOS and Android. In the app, you can track temperature readings, set remindersand input related symptoms and medications for advice right on your smartphone.

BOX CONTAINS
Nokia Thermo, 2 x AAA Batteries, Quick Installation Guide, Free Nokia Account, Free Nokia Health Mate App
feature_bullets: High precision, FDA cleared - Thermo has 16 infrared sensors to provide a highly accurate result
Quick and easy - Ultra-fast measurement with color-coded fever indicator
No contact with skin required — Ultra-hygienic, non-invasive measurement
Automatic Synchronization - Data from every measurement and health advice appears in the Thermo app automatically via Wi-Fi (iOS and Android️)
Multi-user friendly - Up to 8 users can access their personal temperature histories and have the ability to share with doctors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars548 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
